ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But persisted in that greater sin,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and had persisted in the Great Sin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And were stubborn upon the great sin (of disbelief).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And were persisting in great sin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they persisted in the great violation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and persisted in the Great Sin,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And used to persist in the awful sin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and they persisted obstinately in awful sin,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they have been persisting in the heinous offence.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and they used to persist in the great sin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And persisted obstinately in wickedness supreme!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And were persisting in great sin (joining partners in worship along with Allah, committing murders and other crimes, etc.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and persisted in the great sin
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they used to persist in immense wrongdoing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they used to persist in the great violation,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:46] and they used to persist in the great sin, namely, idolatry.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And used to persist) in the life of the world (in the awful sin) i.e. associating partners with Allah; and it is also said that this refers to the lying oath.
